item.description:
[Description]
If it's the last Tuesday of the month it's Liberty Tuesday.
Liberty Tuesday is a monthly dinner gathering of freedom-minded individuals in the Upper Valley who like to talk about liberty, freedom, politics and current events.

This month's location will be at Village Pizza in Lebanon.

The time is the same: 6PM. Enjoy lively debates about the nature of freedom, who's running for office, what's going on in the Upper Valley, and just good food and camaraderie.

See you there!
item.name: Upper Valley Liberty Meetup
